title: Notes and observations on the Empress of Morocco revised with some few errata's to be printed instead of the postscript, with the next edition of the Conquest of Granada.
author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
notes: Written by Elkanah Settle. Cf. DNB.

"Re-issued in 1687 with a second t.p., Reflections on several of Mr. Dryden's plays, particularly the first and second parts of the Conquest of Granada, by E. Settle, gent."--Camb. Hist. Eng. lit., v. 8, p. 459.
Pages from Dryden's "Notes and observations" and excerpts from his "Conquest of Granada" are marked in the text and commented upon by Settle. Cf. verso of fourth prelim. page.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
